name: Sentry Ward
description: A form of plant originally grown in the garden of a fearful king.

abilities.name: Plant
abilities.description: Plants an invisible and phased Sentry Ward at the target location, which reveals nearby invisible enemy units and wards around it. Provides flying vision in a small area for a short while upon planting.
notes: Holding the CTRL allows Plant to be cast on an allied hero, sharing a Sentry Ward with them, using the item's cast range
The ward takes a fixed amount of attacks to be destroyed. Creeps take more attacks than heroes, treats Illusions and Creep-Heroes as creeps
Attacks against Sentry Wards cannot miss. Melee units have an increased attack range when attacking Sentry Wards
The player that placed the ward can always attack it with any of their units. However, all their attacks are treated as non-hero attacks, until the ward comes within the 50% deny range
Cannot be placed in Fountain areas, Roshan's pits, within bound radius of buildings and trees, or on impassable terrain

additionalInfo: Stacks with itself and with Observer Wards in the inventory, there is no stack limit. The sell value adapts based on the number of instances in a stack
Wards from multiple players are combined when given by allies
Sentry Ward's True Sight is considered team vision, and is not bound to the player that placed the ward
This means if that player has their vision limited to themselves, wards placed by them do not grant them True Sight
